name: Endive Salad With Walnuts and Roquefort
recipeIngredient: 1/2 teaspoon kosher salt, plus more to taste
6 heads endive, leaves separated, washed and dried
1/2 cup walnuts, toasted and coarsely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: In a large bowl, combine the shallots and vinegar. Slowly whisk in the walnut oil. Season with 1/2 teaspoon of salt and pepper to taste. Add the endive leaves and walnuts and toss to coat well. Taste and add more salt if needed. Divide the salad among 4 plates. Sprinkle with Roquefort and serve immediately.
